name: Geist Borrow
description: Supplies {{token}} to [Geist Finance](https://geist.finance/deposit) to generate interest and earn GEIST. This strategy also borrows tokens against {{token}}. Borrowed tokens are then deposited into the corresponding yVault to generate yield. Earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy.

en.name: Geist Borrow
en.description: Supplies {{token}} to [Geist Finance](https://geist.finance/deposit) to generate interest and earn GEIST. This strategy also borrows tokens against {{token}}. Borrowed tokens are then deposited into the corresponding yVault to generate yield. Earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy.

fr.name: Geist Borrow
fr.description: Fournit du {{token}} sur [Geist Finance](https://geist.finance/deposit) pour générer des intérêts et gagner des GEIST. Cette stratégie emprunte également des jetons contre le {{token}}. Les jetons empruntés sont ensuite déposés dans le yVault correspondant pour générer du rendement. Les jetons gagnés sont récoltés, vendus pour plus de {{token}} qui sont ensuite redéposés dans la stratégie.

es.name: Geist Borrow
es.description: Suministra {{token}} a [Geist Finance](https://geist.finance/deposit) para generar intereses y ganar GEIST. Esta estrategia también toma prestados tokens contra {{token}}. Los tokens prestados luego se depositan en el yVault correspondiente para generar rendimiento. Los tokens ganados se cosechan, se venden por más {{token}} que se deposita nuevamente en la estrategia.

tr.name: Geist Borrow
tr.description: Faiz ve GEIST kazanmak için [Geist Finance](https://geist.finance/deposit)'e {{token}} sağlar. Bu strateji ayrıca {{token}} karşılığında token ödünç alır. Ödünç alınan token'ler daha sonra verim elde etmek için ilgili yVault'a yatırılır. Kazanılan jetonlar toplanır, stratejiye geri yatırılan daha fazla {{token}} karşılığında satılır.

Borrowed tokens are then deposited into the corresponding yVault to generate yield. Earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy.

zh.name: Geist Borrow
zh.description: 将 {{token}} 存入 [Geist Finance](https://geist.finance/deposit) 赚取利息和 GEIST 奖励。以 {{token}} 作为抵押品借出其他代币，存入对应的 yVault 产生收益。收获赚取的代币卖掉换为更多的 {{token}} 并进行复投。
